entry.source: Suspicious-looking armed troops have come{F801}from the Toyama area, and are wandering{F801}around {F804,5}Shinjuku.{F804,0} These are the ghostly{F801}spirits of those who failed to protect the{F801}country, and they are spreading poison all{F801}over! Please help us slay these demons!{F801}
